reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Women's handicraft workshop in Beni Khedeche

description.narrative: Appel Charite de Beni Khedeche-association aims at establishing a handicraft workshop for the women of Beni Khedeche a small marginalized village in south-west Tunisia which currently lacks any kind of vocational training possibilities for its 3000 inhabit ants. The main goal for this project is to improve the status of women living in Beni Khedeche by increasing their financial autonomy through gaining handicraft skills by vocational training. The learned skills will ideally enable them to commercialize the handicraft production (such as sewing). The ultimate goal of this project is to support the association in developing the center to operate self-sufficiently in the long run. The project is estimated to run for 12 months and will be supported by 70 000 TN D.
